Description.Name: Hotel Alert
Description.Text: Complimentary airport transfer available with advanced reservations through hotel direct. Full flight details required.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: Choose meeting and events facilities equipped with the latest technology.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: Select perfect indoor and outdoor locations for meetings, conferences and social events.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: Comprehensive business center facilities featuring extended and audiovisual services.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: Meeting rooms with latest audio-visual technology to suit any event or meeting.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: The ideal location for your next corporate or social event.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Creative coffee breaks, lunch and dinner options.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: Exquisite catering options, customized to enhance weddings, social events and theme parties.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: Event and wedding assistance to personalize & coordinate every detail from start to finish.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: Hotel cuisine offers excellent menu options for any event or occasion.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: 335 sq m Mirbat Ballroom can beautifully host events for up to 350 guests.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: Spacious guest rooms, making it a perfect choice for out-of-town guests.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 6
Description.Text: Select spectacular outdoor function space available on the grounds and by the hotel pool.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: All rooms and suites feature sea, pool or mountains views each with private balcony or terrace.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: 51 luxurious Chalets, located directly on the white sandy beach of Mirbat Cove with 1 or 2 bedrooms.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Choose from 67 well-appointed suites that offer complimentary snacks and drinks.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: New Marriott bedding with comfortable mattress toppers, cotton-rich linens for king and twin beds.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Free High speed Internet access and satellite TV with international channels ideal for travelers.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: Select our hotel interconnecting rooms available to offer ideal family or friends escapes.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights

Choose from 67 well-appointed suites that offer complimentary snacks and drinks.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: Dip into the 2000sqm swimming pool - the largest pool in the Sultanate of Oman.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: Escape to nature and enjoy the pleasant climate and the cool temperatures in the Dhofar region.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: Extensive massage services and beauty shop available at the Health Club & Spa.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Discover the lush greenery of Wadi Darbat, the major attraction in the Dhofar region.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: Visit the ancient Frankincense Souk of Salalah and feel the warm sense of Omani hospitality.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: Wonders of the Past - discover the UNESCO World Heritage Site of the ancient Insence Port Khor Rori.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 4
Description.Text: Fine Display of Omani History at Al Bilad Archaeological Park & The Museum of the Frankincense Land.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 5
Description.Text: Revive your senses at the onsite Balinese Health Club & Spa.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 6
Description.Text: Visit the powerful blowholes in Mughsayl, west of Salalah, for an energetic outdoor experience.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: The Salalah Marriott Resort in Mirbat offers luxurious rooms, suites and beach chalets with sea and mountain views. Located in the south of Oman, this resort is the ideal place for a family vacation, diving trip, spa experience, meeting or wedding.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: The Salalah Marriott Resort is located on the idyllic shores of the Arabian Sea in Oman's Dhofar region on the white sandy beaches of Salalah Cove and at the foot of Jebel Samhan mountains, 80 kilometers from Salalah International Airport. Beach hotel in Salalah offering luxurious facilities, 237 spacious rooms, suites and beach chalets with sea, pool and mountain views for families, groups and individual travelers alike. Explore our six Marriott resort restaurants, bars offering intriguing views with Arabian and international cuisine to complement a day filled with outdoor activities. Revive your senses at the Health Club & Spa with unique treatments & massages. This Mirbat resort is the ideal retreat for a family vacation, group holiday, honeymooner’s gateway, events, diving trips and snorkeling sites. Discover the lush greenery of Wadi Darbat during Khareef, magnificent sand dunes and local ancient Mirbat forts of the Dhofar region.

Description.Name: HWS Header Tag
Description.Text: Enjoy beach solitude at 5 star luxury resort in Salalah.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: The Salalah Marriott Resort in Oman is set on the idyllic shores of the Arabian Sea on the white sandy beaches of Mirbat Cove and at the foot of Jebel Samhan mountains, 80 kilometers from Salalah International Airport, in the Dhofar region.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Our ‘All Day Dining Restaurant’ offers a tantalizing Buffet and a La Carte menu, live cooking stations and theme nights. Enjoy sumptuous buffets for breakfast and dinner both indoors or al fresco style.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: For all those who love seafood, this fine-dining restaurant offers fresh seafood from finest local treasures in a charming ambiance. Our Chefs, committed to quality are passionate to serve only the best of the best to our valued guests.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Located at the lobby level displaying floor to ceiling windows offering stunning views of the 2000sqm pool and the Arabian Sea. Sink into a comfy couch and sip on freshly brewed coffee with a wide variety of delicious pastry to choose from.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Walk through the doors of our Arabic café and enter the unique and intimate settings that will transport you instantly to the magical world of the Middle East. Indulge in oriental delights and complete the evening with savory shisha at the grand terrace.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Set the stage for a great evening in our beautifully decadent warm furnished bar. Enjoy a friends gathering or just a drink by yourself and pick on the perfectly balanced finger food or a la carte accompanied by cocktails or fine spirits.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Located in our 2000 sqm pool swim up to a breath of fresh air or relax on sunbeds and sip exotic drinks while basking in the desert sun. Enjoy an informal poolside lunch menu with salads, sandwiches and refreshing cold desserts.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: International spot that features a la carte menu and a variety of indoor entertainment.

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: From Salalah Airport drive towards Burj Al Nahdah Roundabout and take the third exit towards Al Saadah/Ar Rubat Road (49) until you reach the next roundabout Umm Al Ghawarif. Take the first exit of the roundabout towards the Ar Rubat Roundabout on Al Mansurrah Street towards South Dahariz/Mirbat. Follow the Marriott Resort sign there. At Ar Rubat Roundabout (the horse roundabout) take the third exit heading towards Al Dahariz and Taqah. At the next roundabout take the second exit, towards Taqah. You are now on As Sultan Qaboos Street. Continue driving on road RT 49 for 68km passing Ayn Razat, Taqah until you reach Mirbat. At the entrance of Mirbat town follow the Marriott Resort sign that will point to the left, indicating 9km. Follow the road until you reach the next Marriott Resort sign indicating 6km to the right. Take a right at this junction and follow the road through the residential area of Mirbat. At the next Marriott sign, take a left on Al Fateh Road and drive for 6 km until you reach the Resort.

Directions from Highway to Property
Description.Text: Drive on RT 49 until you reach the town of Mirbat. At the entrance of Mirbat town follow the Marriott Resort sign that will point to the left, indicating 9km. Follow the road until you reach the next Marriott Resort sign indicating 6km to the right. Take a right at this junction and follow the road through the residential area of Mirbat. At the next Marriott sign, take a left on Al Fateh Road and drive for ca. 4km until you reach the Resort.

BarDescription.Name: Bar Short Description
BarDescription.Text: Meet your mates at the Cove for some traditional pub grub and a chilled pint while cheering for your favorite sports team. But that's not all. We also do a female version with Martinis, finger food and sunset!

BarDescription.Name: Bar Short Description
BarDescription.Text: Sit back, get comfy and end the evening on a cozy note with Cognac and sultry Cuban and feel the Latin vibe of Havana.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Due to the sudden change in climate the sea is rough and unsuitable for Diving or any underwater activity. Hence The Diving center will remain closed until September 2013 or until further notice.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Together at High Speed - Free Internet Access

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Log on to the Internet for free. Anytime. In the comfort of your guest room or amid the energy of the lobby. Wherever you choose, you’ll find your benefit waiting. Just check in and connect. We look forward to welcoming you on your next stay at Salalah Marriott Resort. It's our pleasure!

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Together at High Speed - Free Internet Access

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Log on to the Internet for free. Anytime. In the comfort of your guest room or amid the energy of the lobby. Wherever you choose, you’ll find your benefit waiting. Just check in and connect. We look forward to welcoming you on your next stay at Salalah Marriott Resort. It's our pleasure!

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: The Dhofar Region features Khareef - the unique Arabian monsoon. The gentle monsoon drizzle and overcast skies cool everything down, and before, long before the landscape turns a magical technicolour green. Call us at 00968 23275500 or drop us an e-mail at mhrs.sllms.reservations@marriott.com.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Marriott International’s new Arabic-language website www.arabic.marriott.com allows travelers to browse and book rooms, confirm their stays and change reservations among Marriott International’s hotel portfolio of nearly 3,800 properties around the world.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: A complimentary airport transfer from / to Salalah International Airport is available upon receiving a 24 hour e-mail notice in advance with your exact flight details. The shuttle can wait up to 45 minuted after the landing time.Emai us at mhrs.sllms.ays@marriotthotels.com.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: A complimentary airport transfer from / to Salalah International Airport is available upon receiving a 24 hour e-mail notice in advance with your exact flight details. The shuttle can wait up to 45 minuted after the landing time.Emai us at mhrs.sllms.ays@marriotthotels.com.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Cool down in the hotel outdoor pools. Swim a few laps. Relax in the sun. Dive back in. Repeat as often as necessary. Call us at our new number 00968 23275500 or drop us an e-mail at mhrs.sllms.reservations@marriott.com.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Cool down in the hotel outdoor pools. Swim a few laps. Relax in the sun. Dive back in. Repeat as often as necessary. Call us at our new number 00968 23275500 or drop us an e-mail at mhrs.sllms.reservations@marriott.com.

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: Reconnect with nature in Dofar region Salalah Oman, land of gardens, mountain springs and stunning natural beauty, rewarding yourself with a break and recharge your mind, body. Our team is dedicated to provide a memorable holiday experience.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: Salalah Marriott Resort is welcoming you to stretch out in one of our 237 luxurious accommodation either deluxe, executive & presidential suites, or chalets. All our accommodations feature stunning Sea, pool or Mountain View.

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: Fully equipped rooms and suites offer Marriott confortable bedding. All rooms feature high-speed internet access, satellite TV’s, marble bathrooms, alarm clock, in-room safe, mini bar, and two phone lines. Suites showcase large living rooms.

Description.Name: Value proposition 4
Description.Text: Choose from 8 restaurants and lounges to infuse your senses in traditional Omani cuisine or just to encounter your well known international choices that fit perfectly your lifestyle. Either for leisure or business; we have the perfect venue for you.

Description.Name: Value proposition 5
Description.Text: Event and meeting facilities feature three meetings rooms with 1955 sqm of total meeting space the largest Mirbat Ballroom with capacity of 396. Our Spa offer 4 treatment rooms, where you can choose a wide range of body treatments, massages, and facials.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: High Season for Tour Series, from Europe, mainly Germany, Austria, Sweden, UK and Italy.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Low Season for international tour series, mainly due to weather conditions as Salalah is very hot and humid. Also it is Khareef Season, rain season which is more attractive for local market / regional market rather than European market.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Shoulder Season for international travel market mainly due to the weather conditions as Salalah is humid and hot during this month.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Shoulder Season for International Market. Attractive travel period already due to the fact, that the south of Oman is still covered in lush greenery from the monsoon period July - August.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: High Season for local and regional GCC due to the Khareef Season. Season characterized through misty and rainy weather and cool temperatures. Especially nice due to the greenery and filled wadis.

Description.Name: Group Description
Description.Text: The Marriott Salalah Resort is a luxurious hotel located in Salalah Mirbat Beach, Oman on Mirbat Beach, 45 minutes drive from Salalah International Airport. Our hotel is located on the beach nearby local attractions and Wadi Darbat waterfalls, suitable outdoor and leisure activity. Large pool, fully equipped fitness center, two tennis courts and extensive spa facilities offer an array of recreational and leisure activities. There’s dedicated space for exclusive meeting and banqueting space, including a 3606 sq ft ballroom perfectly suited for large meetings, receptions and weddings. Six innovative restaurants are available (the largest 120 pax) and lounges featuring exquisite venues with refreshing local and international cuisine. Local attractions include a lush greenery of Wadi Darbat offering a variety of outdoor activities.

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: The Marriott Salalah Resort is a luxurious hotel located in Salalah Mirbat Beach, Oman on Mirbat Beach, 45 minutes drive from Salalah International Airport. Our hotel is located on the beach nearby local attractions and Wadi Darbat waterfalls, suitable outdoor and leisure activity. Large pool, fully equipped fitness center, two tennis courts and extensive spa facilities offer an array of recreational and leisure activities. There’s dedicated space for exclusive meeting and banqueting space, including a 3606 sq ft ballroom perfectly suited for large meetings, receptions and weddings. Six innovative restaurants are available (the largest 120 pax) and lounges featuring exquisite venues with refreshing local and international cuisine. Local attractions include a lush greenery of Wadi Darbat offering a variety of outdoor activities.
